column1: #Text=US director James Gunn fired from Marvel Studios for decade-old offensive tweets

#Text=On Friday , US director and screenwriter James Gunn was fired from work on Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 for Marvel Studios reportedly for his offensive tweets from 2008 to 2011 about , amongst other things , rape and paedophilia .
#Text=Image : Mingle Media TV ( flickr ) ( CC BY 2.0 ) .

#Text=In a statement , Walt Disney Studios ' Chairman Alan Horn said , " The offensive attitudes and statements discovered on James ' Twitter feed are indefensible and inconsistent with our studio 's values , and we have severed our business relationship with him " .

column1: #Text=The Walt Disney Company owns Marvel Studios .
#Text=James Gunn wrote the screenplay and directed Marvel movies Guardians of the Galaxy , released in 2014 , and Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 , released in 2017 .

#Text=Based on the comic book characters in the Marvel Comics , the movie franchise featured Chris Pratt , Zoe Saldana , Dave Bautista , Karen Gillian as well as Bradley Cooper and Vin Diesel as voice cast for CGI characters .
#Text=The two movies earned a worldwide box office revenue of about USD 773 million and USD 864 million per Box Office Mojo 's statistics .
#Text=Gunn had been writing the third movie in the franchise reportedly to be released in 2020 .
#Text=Responding to his firing , James Gunn said , " My words of nearly a decade ago were , at the time , totally failed and unfortunate efforts to be provocative .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=In one of the old tweets , Gunn wrote ,  The best thing about being raped is when you 're done being raped and it 's like ' whew this feels great , not being raped ! ' "

column1: #Text=Dave Bautista , who portrays Drax the Destroyer in Gunn 's Marvel movies , tweeted about Gunn 's dismissal saying , " James Gunn is one of the most loving , caring , good natured people I have ever met .
